org.upmc.electisim

Class BordaVotingRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.upmc.electisim.BordaVotingRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IVotingRule

    public class BordaVotingRule
extends java.lang.Object
implements IVotingRule

    A class implementing the k-Borda voting rule, a very common voting rule in the literature. It essentially works like the k-approval (BlocVotingRule) but attributes scores to candidates based on their ranking in the linear order provided by the agent during its vote. Instead of attributing incrementing a candidate's score if present in the k bests of the linear order, it increments the score based on the position of the agent. If we have a linear order L, then the scoring function w(L) will be w(L) = |L| - L.indexOf(agent).

    The voting rule will then select the k candidates with the highest scores.
